page.title: 04S. Yorks. Times Extrct 3
page.content:
Friday, July 12th, 1985
Wath Community Asociation Town Gala at Wath Comprehensive School has attracted 45 organisations and attractions including a dog competition, model aircraft and car demonstration and five-a-side football. There will be childrens roundabouts and a fun castle for the youngsters. The assosiation will be displaying photographs of the towns twinning with St. Jean de Bournay in France. Secretary Mr. Eric Haigh comments: "The response from the folk of Wath has been overwhelming on the folks of St. Jean de Bourney has been just as great."
